GauranlenTreeModeDef.label: cedarmaker
GauranlenTreeModeDef.description: A slow, bumbling caste of dryad which specializes in cedar wood production. Together with its Gauranlen tree, this dryad can generate a cedar-like material on an ongoing basis. However, it is slow and ineffective at work or combat.

GauranlenTreeModeDef.label: ebonymaker
GauranlenTreeModeDef.description: A slow, bumbling caste of dryad which specializes in ebony wood production. Together with its Gauranlen tree, this dryad can generate a ebony-like material on an ongoing basis. However, it is slow and ineffective at work or combat.

GauranlenTreeModeDef.label: mahoganymaker
GauranlenTreeModeDef.description: A slow, bumbling caste of dryad which specializes in mahogany wood production. Together with its Gauranlen tree, this dryad can generate a mahogany-like material on an ongoing basis. However, it is slow and ineffective at work or combat.

GauranlenTreeModeDef.label: rosewoodmaker
GauranlenTreeModeDef.description: A slow, bumbling caste of dryad which specializes in rosewood wood production. Together with its Gauranlen tree, this dryad can generate a rosewood-like material on an ongoing basis. However, it is slow and ineffective at work or combat.
